title: Make Every Cucumber Count: Storage & Logistics Hacks for Hot Zones
author: By [Readify] – Nigerian Farmer & Agripreneur
bonus: Step-by-step checklists for harvesting, storage, and transport
description: Stop losing 30–40% of your cucumber harvest before it even reaches the market. This Nigerian-focused guide reveals low-cost, easy-to-implement hacks to reduce spoilage, extend freshness, and improve logistics — even without cold storage.
highlights: 🌅 Best harvesting practices — pick cucumbers at the right time to maximize shelf life
🏺 Affordable storage solutions — from clay pot coolers to simple DIY techniques
🚚 Safe packing & transport methods — even on rough roads
📈 Loss reduction strategies — cut spoilage by up to 50% and increase profits

title: Zero-Waste Tomato: How to Harvest, Store & Sell Without Losing Profit
author: By [Readify] – Nigerian Farmer & Agripreneur
bonus: Checklists and action plans for harvesting, storage, and tomato products
description: Tomato is Nigeria’s most popular crop — but farmers and traders lose nearly half every year due to poor practices. This guide provides step-by-step methods to reduce spoilage, maximize profits, and make the most of every tomato.
highlights: 🌿 Harvest at the right stage to extend shelf life
🏺 Store tomatoes without cold rooms using affordable local methods
📦 Package and transport professionally to reduce bruising and loss
💰 Sell directly to better buyers for higher income
🍅 Turn ‘spoilt’ tomatoes into paste, dried tomatoes, or powder
